DamageResistances: Bludgeoning, Slashing, and Piercing from non-magical weapons

Traits.Name: Tactical Formation
Traits.Content: Militia Soldiers gain a +2 bonus to AC when within 5 feet of an ally.

Traits.Name: Disciplined
Traits.Content: Militia Soldiers have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The militia soldier makes three attacks: one with Shield Bash and two with Bayonet Strike.

Actions.Name: Shield Bash
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage and pushing the target 5 feet away if it is Medium or smaller.

Actions.Name: Bayonet Strike
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Actions.Name: Close Quarters Combat
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage. On a hit, the target is considered to have disadvantage on their next attack roll against the militia soldier before the end of their next turn.
